entry.question: Are the cards revealed when they’re put into the KO area?
entry.answer: Yes. They will be face up in the KO area. Either player can look at them. (Don’t grab your opponent’s cards without permission though.)

entry.question: If my opponent has Secret Actions in their hand, scrap pile, or even in their KO area (say because of Daring Escape), do those count?
entry.answer: No. Decipher counts only the Secret Actions in your opponent’s played area.

entry.question: Does an Autobot Battle Master in upgrade mode on a character still count as an Autobot on the battlefield when putting cards on your KO area for Daring Escape?
entry.answer: No. Daring Escape only counts Autobot characters.

entry.question: Does Daring Escape continually check the whole turn or does it only check when the card is played?
entry.answer: It only checks one time when the card is played, not the whole turn.
